name: AAU SICT moodle (old)
description: This style makes the design of AAU SICT's moodle not suck.
additional_info:
Prettifies:
-Links
-Login
-Boxes
-"Front page"
-Course pages

It also removes the "unused" boxes in moodle:
-Help
-Guides
-Participants
-Administration (except for the unenroll link which is moved to at better location)
-Forum search
-Online users

If you didn't want one of those boxes removed, you can always edit the CSS.

This style also fixes a bug which makes it impossible to see which date it is, if you have a lecture that day.
